name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The winter vacation job recruitment cards distributed on the campus of colleges and universities in Chuzhou, Anhui, all have working hours of 10 hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
South Korea's National Intelligence Service revealed that on the note carried by the dead soldiers, the North Korean authorities had found an order requiring the soldiers to "commit suicide before being captured". Recently, a North Korean soldier shouted "General Kim Jong-un" and tried to commit suicide with a grenade when facing Ukrainian prisoners, but was shot dead.
The total number of casualties of North Korean soldiers sent by North Korea to fight in the Kursk region of Russia exceeded 3,000, including more than 300 deaths and more than 2,700 injuries.
The Ukrainian intelligence department cooperated with the National Intelligence Service to obtain statements from two captured soldiers. According to the confession, the North Korean authorities promised to pay wages and give "hero treatment", but the actual situation did not match the promise, and the soldiers were actually treated as "consumables"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 13, a netizen said in the comment area that he recently received a fraudulent call, and then received a call from the police asking him to go to the police station to register, otherwise his bank card would be frozen. The netizen had no choice but to go to the police station to register his identity, address and other information, and then he had to hold up the registration form and take a photo.
The netizen said: It was obviously me who was defrauded, but not only was I not protected, I was also threatened to freeze my bank card. Why don't they check the fraudsters?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 14, the man said that the protective equipment used by the workers engaged in container spraying in the video was substandard. The workers should have worn chemical protective gloves, but they wore ordinary leather gloves. They should have worn chemical protective clothing, but the workers wore homemade plastic sheets. The man said that after working for a few years, his salary was not enough to cover medical expenses. Many domestic companies do not treat workers as human beings.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Yonhap News Agency, South Korean President Yoon Seok-yeol was just arrested on charges of leading a rebellion

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 15, Wenzhou, Zhejiang. The internet exposed that Ledao, a smart electric car brand, forced its employees to buy cars, and the company promised to buy them back at a 75% discount after six months. If the employees have no money, the company can also handle zero down payment.
The vice president responded: Improper communication, and severe criticism has been made.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some of the first batch of "TikTok refugees" who rushed to Xiaohongshu have already fallen on the beach.
As more and more "TikTok refugees" flock to China's Xiaohongshu, starting from the 14th, many American users reported that their accounts were banned and their posts were censored and removed.
An American user's notes were censored by Xiaohongshu, and the system showed: "Notes are being reviewed, and it is expected to take another 48 hours." He posted a message asking "What's going on?" A netizen replied: "Welcome to 1984 my friend"
According to Phoenix Finance, Xiaohongshu recruited English content reviewers overnight to actively respond to the actual needs of the diverse user groups.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Chinese student bought an Apple product for free at a UK Apple store and posted it online to show off. Some netizens in the comment section expressed their approval of this behavior.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As Trump is about to take office, the People's Daily published a signed article to express goodwill to the United States. The article describes the current situation and prospects of Sino-US relations, and points out that "mutual benefit and win-win" is the essential feature of the relationship between the two countries, and cooperation is still the only correct choice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Just now, the technicians of our community have compiled all the information of the Ten Thousand Stars Return Home Project, cleaned up some duplicate and blank cases, and combined the cases in northern Myanmar and eastern Myanmar. 
At present, our table has registered more than 1,530 cases of missing Chinese citizens in northern Myanmar, representing more than 1,530 broken families.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Changzhou, Jiangsu, host Wang Han said that he had been a host at the Wujin District Media Integration Center for seven years. As traditional media has been declining in recent years, he was laid off at the age of 30. However, it was not until the moment of layoff that he learned that he was not a formal employee but a labor dispatch worker. Wang Han said that he demanded 20,000 yuan in compensation from the company. At present, this video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Our community technicians have counted the number and proportion of cases of missing Chinese citizens in northern Myanmar registered in the Star Home Plan document. Due to the lack of alarm status in some cases or the messy input, the alarm status of about 1/4 of the cases cannot be counted. However, among the remaining valid cases, the police refused to file more than half of the cases! Browse the Star Home document to verify the data

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: We counted the screening keywords and codes used to come up with this conclusion:

content: On January 14, a blogger live-broadcasted a video of Xi Jinping inspecting troops in a car. Some netizens made comments in the live broadcast room: "Is the person in the car an idiot?" "Every shot hits the head, good luck" "He drove against the traffic and covered the license plate"

content: One netizen said that the app developed by their team was removed from the Apple Store in mainland China at the request of the Cyberspace Administration of China. The reason given by the Cyberspace Administration of China was: "Regulations on the Security Assessment of Internet Information Services with Public Opinion Attributes or Social Mobilization Capabilities"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 14, Xiamen, Fujian. Firefighters use high-pressure water cannons to disperse migrant workers who are demanding their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After "TikTok refugees" flooded into China's Xiaohongshu, a user uploaded a photo of the "64 Tank Man" on Xiaohongshu and captioned it: "Fuck the Communist Party"
The account is currently unsearchable and is suspected to have been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 10, it was reported online that a resident on the 17th floor of Building 211 in Hongshan Home Community, Chaoyang District, Beijing, turned on the gas in an attempt to commit suicide but failed. He then lit a charcoal basin to commit suicide, causing an explosion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An American user asked a Chinese netizen a question on Xiaohongshu.
A Chinese netizen reminded American users not to post sensitive content on Xiaohongshu involving politics, religion, drugs, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A "tiktok refugee" from the United States said that the Chinese people on Xiaohongshu are very friendly and do not deprive her of freedom of speech like the US government. As a result, the most liked comment under the video reminded the American not to mention sensitive topics such as politics, religion and drugs, and to adhere to the one-China principle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, an American user posted a picture of Mao Zedong and basketball player LeBron on Xiaohongshu. He wrote: "Love you grandpa"
Chinese netizens replied "You will be blocked, brother"
As of now, the user can no longer be searched, and it is suspected that he has been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chinese company Hytera admits to stealing Motorola radio technology
Chinese wireless communications equipment maker Hytera has admitted in a federal court in Illinois to stealing trade secrets related to digital mobile radio technology from Motorola Solutions. According to court documents, under the plea agreement, Hytera will be fined up to $60 million and must pay additional restitution to Motorola Solutions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 15, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs website was updated to show that Hua Chunying had resigned as spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 14, Hu Xijin published an article advising young people not to take the civil service exam, not to focus on it, and to let things flow. This triggered a rebuttal from netizens: "How can a person who has never swept the road advise a street sweeper? Hu should stop receiving his pension and sweep the road for five years before discussing this issue."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Newsweek: China's largest airline, China Southern Airlines, suspended flights from Beijing to Moscow at the end of January. The unexpected move came on the eve of the Chinese New Year. Reports say it is a blow to Russian President Vladimir Putin.
The Russian Association of Travel Agencies (ATORUS) estimates that the change could affect the travel plans of 15,000 to 17,000 people, citing tourism industry sources as saying that by far the most worrying are those traveling to third countries via the Chinese capital.
In the first quarter of 2024, a total of 218,000 international tourists were registered by Russian border authorities, of which Chinese citizens accounted for nearly half.
China Southern Airlines did not provide a clear reason for the cancellation of flights, and a travel agency told ATOR that the airline has been ignoring requests for explanations.
The European Aviation Safety Agency recommends that foreign airlines avoid the west of 60 degrees east longitude...
fullContent:
美国《新闻周刊》：中国最大的航空公司中国南方航空公司，于1月底暂停北京飞莫斯科的航班。这一出人意料的举动正值中国春节前夕。报道称，这对俄罗斯总统普京来说是一个打击。
 据俄罗斯旅行社协会(ATORUS) 估计，这一变化可能会影响1.5万至1.7万人的旅行计划，并援引旅游业消息人士的话说，到目前为止，最令人担忧的是那些经由中国首都前往第三国的人。
  2024年第一季度，俄罗斯边境当局登记的国际游客总数为21.8万人次，其中中国公民占近一半。
 中国南方航空公司没有提供取消航班的明确原因，一家旅行社告诉ATOR，该航空公司一直无视解释的要求。
 欧洲航空安全局建议外国航空公司避开东经60度以西的地区，该地区经过俄罗斯乌拉尔山脉地区，因为俄罗斯和乌克兰的冲突增加了风险。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: U.S. Republican Senator Marco Rubio: "We previously welcomed the Chinese Communist Party into the global order, and they took all the benefits that came with it, but ignored all the obligations and responsibilities. Instead, they lied, cheated, hacked into networks, and stole at our expense to achieve the status of a global superpower."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 15, Xuexi Qiangguo posted on Weibo: Welcome all new and old friends at home and abroad to download and use "Dahongshu" so that we can study and improve together.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to data from the central bank reported on January 15, my country's household RMB deposits increased by 14.26 trillion yuan in 2024. The balance of household RMB deposits reached 151.25 trillion yuan, with an average deposit of 107,000 yuan per person, which is the first time that my country's per capita deposits have exceeded the 100,000 yuan mark.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 15 (Released) In Haifeng County, Guangdong, a middle-aged man confronted the police with a kitchen knife and was subsequently subdued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A user with a Canadian IP uploaded content related to Winnie the Pooh and the June 4th Incident on Xiaohongshu.
The account is currently unsearchable and is suspected to have been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, the Ministry of Public Security said: We will sort out the situations of our citizens who are missing or trapped abroad and make every effort to coordinate their rescue. If you encounter any relatives who are missing or trapped abroad, please report to the local public security organs in a timely manner.
Netizens have called on the authorities to classify it as kidnapping and human trafficking, rather than fraud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
TikTok reportedly plans to shut down its app for U.S. users on Sunday. 
Reuters reported on Wednesday (January 15) that TikTok plans to shut down its app for U.S. users on Sunday, the day the federal ban takes effect, unless the U.S. Supreme Court intervenes to block the ban.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, an American user posted on Xiaohongshu, asking which books on modern Chinese history are the most reliable.
A Chinese netizen recommended "Outline of Modern Chinese History" in the comment section, which is a key textbook for Marxist theory research and construction projects.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Li Guorui, a 41-year-old Chinese man, was arrested and charged in court for urinating on the electric handrail at Outram Park MRT station in Singapore.
Li Guorui was charged with a public nuisance. According to Singapore law, offenders who disrupt public order may face up to three months in prison and a fine of up to $2,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the regular press conference of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, a reporter asked: Recently, hundreds of thousands of so-called "TikTok refugees" from the United States have flocked to the Xiaohongshu APP. Will China strengthen the review of foreign-related user content and comments on the APP in order to safeguard national security interests? What impact will this have on China's diplomacy? 
Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Which social media to use is a personal choice. As a principle, China has always supported and encouraged countries to strengthen cultural exchanges and promote people-to-people exchanges.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reuters reported that two sources familiar with Xiaohongshu said they are working to find ways to review English content and develop Chinese-English translation tools.
Currently, Xiaohongshu has only one version and does not adopt the dual-version model of Douyin & TikTok and WeChat & WeChat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
None of the original research drugs were selected in this round of medical insurance centralized procurement, and the gradual withdrawal of original research drugs from public hospitals has become a foregone conclusion. Recently, some medical staff complained about the poor quality of medical equipment on social platforms.
A medical staff member said that when he was giving the patient warm water for nasogastric feeding, the syringe broke while pushing the pusher. Last month, the hospital could still prescribe imported semirocilb (used to treat acute pain in adults), but starting this month, only domestic products are available, and "it hurts as much as not taking it"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At a ceremony at the Slovak presidential palace, 19-year-old high school student Simon Omanik, wearing a ribbon in Ukrainian colors on his chest, refused to shake hands with their pro-Russian president.
